description:
Bunji doesn’t keep a calm composure when crossing the street which worries Mom that one day he will get into an accident.  On day, Bunji was late so mom couldn’t help but…; Grandma and Bunji are left at home as Fumi goes shopping with Mom. If Bunji went as well, he would enjoy it at the beginning but he would gradually turn the other way; Mom begins to read Taro’s book to Bunji and Fumi. But from one of Bunji’s simple questions, the talk of Taro begins to gradually escalate; In order to teach the kids to become independent, Mom told them to go to bed on their own. However, the two weren’t used to it so they tried every which way to not be separated from their mom.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Starting tomorrow / Seriously, starting tomorrow / Bedtime stories / Luxurious worry
